price: Mereka tidak disusahkan oleh kedahsyatan yang besar (pada hari kiamat) dan mereka disambut oleh para malaikat.  (Malaikat berkata), "Inilah harimu yang telah dijanjikan kepadamu".
arabic: لَا يَحۡزُنُهُمُ ٱلۡفَزَعُ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ هَٰذَا يَوۡمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yaḥzunuhumu al-fazaʿu al-akbaru watatalaqqāhumu al-malāikatu hādhā yawmukumu alladhī kuntum tūʿadūna
